title: Goldman Sachs added 7 new leaders at the top — all from its $3.6 trillion wealth and investing business
full_text:
Goldman Sachs added 7 new leaders at the top — all from its $3.6 trillion wealth and investing business. All seven new management committee members come from Goldman Sachs' growing asset and wealth management division, which oversees $3.6 trillion.. Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon.PATRICK T. FALLON/AFP via Getty Images
  • Goldman named seven partners to its management committee on Monday.
  • The management committee steers the firm's … [+3950 chars]
